meanings.definition: A person who shares a room or apartment with another person.
meanings.sent1: My roommates and I take turns cleaning the apartment.
meanings.sent2: I have two roommates who are very friendly and helpful.
meanings.sent3: My roommates always leave their socks lying around, it's like a sock party in here!
meanings.sent4: Living with roommates is like having built-in friends at home.
meanings.sent5: Having roommates means never feeling lonely in the evenings.

meanings.definition: The people who share a room or apartment.
meanings.sent1: Our roommates are planning a movie night this weekend.
meanings.sent2: The roommates in our building often organize potluck dinners.
meanings.sent3: Sometimes our roommates play pranks on each other, it's always good fun.
meanings.sent4: Living with roommates can teach you a lot about sharing and compromise.
meanings.sent5: My roommates are like family to me, we support each other through everything.
